title: Hayasegawa-kun to Megami na Oneesan
original_name: 早瀬川君と女神なお姉さん
sinopse:
A beautiful older woman regularly visits a coffee shop where the high school student Hayasegawa-kun works at. He doesn't know her name, her job, or where she lives, but she is nevertheless his "ideal woman."

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
